subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tomas Plekanec scored 13 minutes 19 seconds into overtime to give the eighth-seeded Montreal Canadiens a 3-2 victory over the top-seeded Capitals in Washington in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference playoff series.
